Extension of deputation period of Technical Officers [Manager(T); DGM(T) & GM(T)] Qualitative Assessment of Performance of Officers before   considering their extension: In the interest of the organization, it is required to properly and qualitatively assess the performance of officers on deputation so that officers who are performing well only are considered for extension of deputation period: 2 Henceforth; while recommending extension of deputation period of Technical Officers [Manager(T) , DGM(T) & GM(T)] , concerned RO will assess the performance of the officer as per the attributes in the format enclosed and send his assessment to CGM(T) at HQ. CGM(T) at HQ will review the assessment of RO and give his views to Member concerned, who in turn will send it to Member (Admn) with his comments.
